page.title: 05Roads and Traffic
page.content: The{narrow and winding A 39}brings most of the holiday traffic into this block. From the stretch above Perry Farm there are superb views both across the{Bristol Channel and {to North Hill}overshadowing the hoiday resort of{Minehead.} Many motorist stop on this section of road to take{photographs. } However less than a kilometre on from this point the A.39 enters a notorious section known locally as {"The St. Audries Walls".}The road here makes an S bend round the side of the {Quantock Hills}and is very narrow but the{main problem}arises out of the fact that the road is bounded on both sides by intimidating stone walls that are three metres high in places. Heavy vehicles meeting here can cause traffic chaos..
